subject: [cc-community]  Free Me to download!
body:
Hi!

I've just made the Free Me DVD available for download from
archive.org! I posted about this a while ago and I know it's been a
bit slow getting to this point but things are still moving forwards!
I'm sorry to people who e-mailed me about it last time if you didn't
get a reply, I've been having problems with my e-mail on and off so it
really wasn't intentional!

The link is http://www.archive.org/download/FreeMe_DVD/FreeMe.iso

I hope you enjoy the disc if you watch it or share it with friends -
see this blog post for more details:
http://questionsplease.org/freeme/2007/05/04/download/

And if you're not sure what the disc is visit
http://questionsplease.org/freeme :D

Cheers,

Jon
